content: and anchor it in the designated back loop stitch of round 29 to the right or left as stated do not confuse with the slip_stitch join - quarter/third stitch of r29 named anchor stitches in- the exposed blo of round 29 used to space and square the corners in r31 r33 follow the exact counts/directions e g 2nd st to the right 3rd st to the left work on the back of the work in r34 place single crochets into the closing chains of r26 r27 on the back of the piece to create overlaid arches keep an even gauge so the fabric lies flat cluster a group of stitches closed as a single unit counts as 1 unless otherwise stated 9 57 - lapis a start in the first stitch of any side b work 26 half_double_crochet c across the central panel 3 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next st 5 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet in next st repeat the increases in parentheses 4 more times then 3 half_double_crochet 50 half_double_crochet across the panel d work 26 half_double_crochet to finish the side chain 3 for the corner e repeat for the remaining three sides f join with a slip_stitch to the first half_double_crochet totals 408 half_double_crochet 102 per side 4 chain-3 corner spaces 58 - lapiz a start in the first half_double_crochet of any side b work 102 fphdc chain 3 for the corner c repeat 3 more times one per side d join with a slip_stitch to the first fphdc totals 408 fphdc 102 per side 4 chain-3 corner spaces 10 59 - wisteria a start in the second chain-1 space of r45a in any corner and work 1 puff3 b in each stitch of the previous round work 1 slip_stitch c when you reach the corner again in the second chain-1 space of r45a 1 puff3 ch2 1 slip_stitch in the same chain-1 space d repeat 3 more times e join with 1 slip_stitch in the first chain-1 space total 8 puff3 2 pr corner 4 ch2 1 per corner 400 slip_stitch 100 per corner 60 - camel a see video for visual reference b start in any corner of round 58 *2 treble_crochet in the chain-3 space c work in the back loop of round 57 skip 1 st d 1 treble_crochet chain 1 e 1 treble_crochet in the same chain-3 corner space 11 f skip the 2 stitches immediately to the left of the first treble_crochet 1tr in next st chain 1 g treble_crochet in the stitch 2 positions to the right of the previous 1tr crossing in front h repeat steps e and f 8 more times i 1 slip_stitch in the 3rd fphdc blo of r57 in the central panel chain 15 j in the chain-20 space of r49g work 5 single_crochet separated by chain 3 k chain 15 1 slip_stitch in the 3rd fphdc blo of r57 l repeat steps e and f 9 more times m on the last repetition the treble_crochet of
